resources.string: Your previous order are listed below:
Q.1 Why is HungerDirectory doing this?

A.1 At FoodDirectory we strive to add value to your business. We understand the challenges you face on a daily basis in sourcing the best quality packaging material. FoodDirectory Packaging Assist is to take care of all your packaging needs.
Q.2 How are you guys are different?

A.2 Best products - we only list the products which have passed our tests and are the best suitable for delivery. They will help in giving a better consumer experience, so you can get repeated orders. Best Prices - We have negotiated rates with our distributors exclusive for the HungerDirectory. Convenience - No need to haggle for the prices. No need to follow-up on delivery. We track all orders to ensure you have a hassle free experience.
Q.3 What if the restaurant has changed its prices?
A.3 If there has been a menu change and there is a difference of more than %.00 we will contact you to make sure the price difference is ok or if you want to change an item.
Q.4 Who is the person behind this project?
A.4 This is Varun Prajapati, behind this project.
Can\'t find any Restaurant with that name!!!
